name: com.aurelienribon.gitquickcheckout
description: Quickly checkout all workspace folders to any branch. Autocompletion will provide a list of all branches available in the whole workspace, for fast switching.

commands.title: GitQuickCheckout: Switch all workspaces folders to another branch...

gitquickcheckout.defaultBranchName.description: Default branch to checkout in all folders for which selected branch is not available.
